title: Demanding Loyalty, China Moves to Overhaul Hong Kong Elections
content:
1. Demanding Loyalty, China Moves to Overhaul Hong Kong Elections  The New York Times
  2. China announces 'over 6%' economic growth target, tech plans  The Associated Press
  3. NPC Update: China Moves to Curb Hong Kong Opposition's Role in Elections  Bloomberg
  4. China’s Crackdown on Hong Kong Tested in Trial of Pro-Democracy Politicians  The Wall Street Journal
  5. China legislature to deliberate Hong Kong electoral changes  The Associated Press
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 要求忠诚，中国将对香港选举进行全面改革。
要求忠誠，中國將對香港選舉進行全面改革。
